issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
*Titanium javascript classic application*

How can I take a picture using camera or get a file from gallery, and save in GDrive account and get back the direct url for file in GDrive.

I need a solution for both android/iphone ASAP!!!!

*Cant find solution api/ module/ code sample in the stackoverflow forum!!*

Thanks in advance
fields.summary: take a picture using camera or get a file from gallery and save in GDrive

comments.body: Hello, this is our bug reporting portal. Please ask your query in support.appcelerator.com, also ask in stakeoverflow. Thanks.
